data.eml:eml: Second contribution to the knowledge of water mites from the Comoros, with the description of one new species (Acari: Hydrachnidia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smit, Harry, Pesic, Vladimir, Mary-Sasal, Nathalie (2010): Second contribution to the knowledge of water mites from the Comoros, with the description of one new species (Acari: Hydrachnidia). Zootaxa 2413: 51-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194335
